snippet: Samuel Rhodes, the violist of the Juilliard String Quartet since 1969, is leaving the group at the end of the season, to be replaced by Roger Tapping, formerly of the Takacs Quartet.
abstract: Samuel Rhodes, the violist of the Juilliard String Quartet since 1969, is leaving the group at the end of the season, to be replaced by Roger Tapping, formerly of the Takacs Quartet.

headline.main: More Turnover in the Juilliard String Quartet
